General.Name: Lianhe Chemical Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Lianhe Chemical Technology Co., Ltd. engages in thr production and sale of chemical products in China. It also offers crop protection products, including herbicides, insecticides, fungicides, and plant growth regulators; medicines, and functional chemicals, as well as engineering technology and equipment manufacturing services. The company was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Taizhou, China.

1.Name: Mr. Chun  He
1.Title: Sr. VP of Functional Chemicals Division & Director

3.Title: Sr. VP & Sec. of The Board of Directors
